opis: Na prodaju: Kuća za odmor s apartmanima – Lokva Rogoznica, Omiš Prodaje se kuća za odmor idealna za turistički najam, smještena u mirnom okruženju mjesta Lokva Rogoznica,nadomak Omiša, u Splitsko-dalmatinskoj županiji. Za dodatne informacije i razgledavanje, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. Ugovor o posredovanju. For Sale: Holiday Home with Apartments – Lokva Rogoznica, Omiš A holiday home ideal for tourist rental is for sale, located inthe peaceful village of Lokva Rogoznica near Omiš, in the Split-Dalmatia County. The property is part of a western-facing row and is situated close to the sea. Property Description: Ground floor + 2 upper floors Net enclosed area: 209 m² Balconies: 21.80 m² + 22.40 m² Terrace: 6.20 m² Layout: 3 apartments: 2 apartments of 19 m² each 1 apartment of 30 m² 1 two-bedroom apartment – 50 m² 1 three-bedroom apartment – 56 m² Documentation: Clean ownership (1/1) Building and occupancy permits An excellent investment opportunity for tourism, with the option to continue an already well-established rental business.
